==Chinese==
{{zh-forms}}

===Etymology===
Originally a Buddhist concept, it referred to one who possessed divine powers. Later on, it came to be used metaphorically to describe to anyone with a special talent.

===Pronunciation===

|m=shéntōng
|c=san4 tung1
|mn=sîn-thong
|cat=n
}}

===Noun===
{{zh-noun}}

# {{lb|zh|literary}} a [[special]] [[talent]]
